name: iFyood
description:
iFyood is the next generation of visual novel video games. You play the role of an average teenage  girl making her way through life. She has a best friend, a crush, and a lot of choices to make on the way. The game involves choices in romance, friendship, and even career. So far it's a very well made Visual Novel, and should be on everyone's radar. This game has a lot of potential to shine, with good voice acting and soundtracks. The story is unique, and the characters are interesting enough to be remembered. The art style is one of a kind, and it fits the story perfectly. If you like Visual Novels and are looking for something different, this is definitely something you should try. I recommend this game to any VN lover who can't get enough of them.

ALSO AVAILABLE IN FULL VERSION , YOUMAY REQUEST A KEY IN COMMENTS OF FULL VERSION AND POSSIBLY MAYGETS ONE IF THE TRICKLER DECIDES
